author: dblevins
msg: Fixed issue with not being able to specify xml overrides for @EJB annotation usage

author: rajith
msg: Changed the ExceptionListener to ClosedListerner that notifies a close event.
Rafi and I decided against throwing an exception as the close (connection or session) can be called by a peer even when there is no error.

author: vgritsenko
msg: Remove some overcomponentization: NOPVariableResolver and PreparedVariableResolver

author: cam
msg: Specifying textLength="" on text elements that have non-text nodes as their
first children now works.  Fixes bug 38498.
